metadata.name: The Genesis
metadata.description:
This is the genesis work that marks the occurrence of Prof. NOTA on the blockchain. This happened simultaneously with the emergence of Prof. NOTA in the IDNFT Academy.

Using the concept from the "Your Cursor is BOMB!", a collection on OBJKT.com created by Prof. NOTA, apart from being a mark, this work is also a tribute to IDNFT Academy participants who have played, learned, and worked together with Prof. NOTA.

Really very big thanks to all participants, all panelists, and all IDNFT Academy teams. We've managed to write our own history, you know... Ahoy Oi Oi..!

Warm regards,

Prof. NOTA

P.S. Please used this NFT to reach me anytime. I'll try to deliver the best help, support, and advice from me in the technical, or technology development for your NFTs project. If available, collect and hold it. Otherwise, please don't regret it.

----
